Performer:
Kiritake Ichisuke (桐竹一輔)

Dates: '1983-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.


Performances as Puppeteer:

July 1986: The Bloodshed at Ise

February 1987: The Love Suicides at Amijima

August 1987: Madame Butterfly

January 1988: The Story of Priest Roben

August 1988: The Dancing Mushrooms

January 1989: The Miracle at the Tsubosaka Kannon Temple

February 1989: The Love Suicide at Amijima

September 1989: The Love-Inspired Murder

July 1990: The Bloodshed at Ise

September 1990: The Adachi Plain in Oshu

May 1991: The New Usuyuki Story

December 1991 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Amorous Courier

May 1992: The Story of Priest Roben

November 1992: The Stone Monument of Glory

February 1993: The Courier for Hell

April 1993: The Tycoon's Exploit
